relatedRecords.name: 365PDX
relatedRecords.description:
An online conference about Microsoft’s Modern Workplace tools: Office 365, Azure, Power Platform, Teams, Power BI, Dynamics 365 and related Microsoft technologies from the Portland and Pacific NW IT community


Thursday & Friday, August 20th & 21st, 2020

relatedRecords.description: A place for API practitioners to come together and discuss the evolution of API technology including cutting edge keynotes and sessions that chart the future of APIs, in-depth specification and standards discussions and an extensive tutorial track.
